---
name: Typography
category: Design
---

### Text Sizes
 
 os tamanhos das fontes s√£o tanto determinados como classe, ou como css variaveis
 
 tamanho como css var
- `.titulo{ font-size: var(--fs-md) }`

 tamanho como classes

- `.fs-xs` - 0.67em;
- `.fs-sm` -  0.75em;
- `.fs-md` - 1em
- `.fs-lg` -  1.333em; 
- `.fs-xlg` - 1.777em;
- `.fs-xxlg` - 2.369em;
- `.fs-xxxlg` -  3.157em;
- `.fs-xxxxlg` - 4.209em;



```typesize.html

<div class="mt-2 fs-xs"> This is a Title with Font Size</div>
<div class="mt-2 fs-sm"> This is a Title with Font Size</div>
<div class="mt-2 fs-md"> This is a Title with Font Size</div>
<div class="mt-2 fs-lg"> This is a Title with Font Size</div>
<div class="mt-2 fs-xlg"> This is a Title with Font Size</div>
<div class="mt-2 fs-xxlg"> This is a Title with Font Size</div>
<div class="mt-2 fs-xxxlg"> This is a Title with Font Size</div>
<div class="mt-2 fs-xxxxlg"> This is a Title with Font Size</div>

```



#### Others typefaces definition

``` othertypefaces.html
    <code> `.text` </code>
    <div class="text"> a normal text </div>

    <code> .title-tables </code>
    <div class="title-tables"> Tabela Title </div>
    
    <code> ..big-number__label </code>
    <div class="big-number__label"> big number labels </div>
    <code> .big-number__number </code>
    <div class="big-number__number"> 123 </div>

    <code> .big-number__number--md </code>
    <div class="big-number__number--md"> 123 </div>

```


<!-- 

#### Sections Title

existe uma classe especial, a `.title` que pode ser usada em toda estrutura


```sectiontitle.html

<div class='container px-4'>

  <h6> Title Normal </h6>

  <div class='title'>
        <h2 class='title__text'> Section title
```
